post:
Webhosting UK's Cloud VPS Hosting is a complete hassle-free solution without the complexity of purchasing and managing servers. Clients can not only enjoy full root SSH/RDP access to their server and their own chosen dedicated operating system, but can also take advantage of the 100% uptime on offer. This uniquely designed and expertly supported Cloud VPS platform is the ideal solution for customers who need big power and high availability without the big price. Signup for our Cloud VPS Hosting today and experience the difference in server performance!


Key features of Linux/Windows Cloud Virtual Private Servers include :-

  • Guaranteed CPU, RAM and Disk space
  • Fault Tolerance
  • VMware Hardware Virtualization
  • 100% Uptime Guarantee
  • Multiple OS Options for Linux/Windows VPS
  • Administrative Access to install Applications
  • Host Multiple Domains
  • Unique IP addresses
  • Fully Managed
  • Ideal for test and development environments

  • 2 Dedicated IP's
  • FREE Setup
